Character.Name: Robb Stark
Character.Special: Attacking Knights in your army add +3 to your combat strength instead of +2.

Character.Name: Master Luwin
Character.Special: If you win this battle, you may return one of your discarded house cards to your hand.

Character.Name: Catelyn Stark
Character.Special: Your Defence order bonus is doubled this battle.(+1 defense to +2, +2 defense to +4)

Character.Name: Sir Jamie Lannister
Character.Special: If you win this battle, immediately gain two power tokens.

Character.Name: Vargo Hoat
Character.Special: Attacking Footman in your army count +2 to your combat strength instead of +1.

Character.Name: Cersei Lannister
Character.Special: If you win this battle, remove any one of the losing opponents Order tokens from the board.

Character.Name: Ser Loras Tyrell
Character.Special: Immediately kill one of your opponent’s attacking or defending Footman units. If your opponent don't have other units, win the battle immediately

Character.Name: Queen of Thorns
Character.Special: Cancel the special ability of your opponents House Card.

Character.Name: Brienne of Tarth
Character.Special: Immediately discard your opponent’s Defence order in the area of battle.

Character.Name: Renly Baratheon
Character.Special: If you win this battle, you may upgrade one of your Footman to a Knight.

Character.Name: Melisandre of Asshai
Character.Special: If you win the battle, you may expend one power token to choose and discard one House Card from the losing Players hand.

Character.Name: Salladhor Saan
Character.Special: The combat strength of any opposed supporting ships is reduced to zero.

Character.Name: Asha Greyjoy
Character.Special: If you win this battle, you may immediately remove a Support or Consolidate Power order in any Sea or Land area adjacent to the battle.

Character.Name: Balon Greyjoy
Character.Special: The combat strength of your opponents Leader is 0.

Character.Name: Victarion Greyjoy
Character.Special: Attacking ships in your army may add +2 to your combat strength instead of +1.
